In this role, you'll analyze data from various sources, identify trends, and share insights with the team and organization. You'll play a critical part in managing projects that affect BCI as a corporation, including workplace optimization, office management, and safety and security initiatives. WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW BCI manages a globally diversified portfolio of assets valued at $295 billion and is one of Canada's largest institutional investors. We invest globally to support pension and other funds for more than 30 clients based in British Columbia. We are proud to have been chosen as one of Canada's Top 100 Employers and BC's Top Employers. These national and provincial competitions recognize employers who offer exceptional workplaces for their employees. As a Co-op/Intern, you'll work on exciting projects that impact the future of our company and our clients. You'll help manage various sized projects including office expansions, reconfigurations, and corporate-wide initiatives. You'll analyze data from multiple sources-including operations, administration services, occupancy sensors, space utilization, and physical security and safety systems-to identify trends, patterns, and process improvements. This is a fantastic opportunity to gain hands-on experience in business analysis, project management, and safety and security program management while making a meaningful impact on our company's growth. WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH The Corporate Data & Operations department is a central hub that delivers essential business services across all departments within the organization. The department is comprised of three branches: Data & Analytics, Business Planning, and Workplace Services. The department facilitates BCI's corporate strategy and plays an integral role in its execution by ensuring staff have high- quality data, advanced analytics for decision-making, and well-appointed global offices for collaboration. The department is a critical part of how BCI delivers long-term value for our clients. Workplace Services, a branch of Corporate Data & Operations, provides employees with a work environment that enables the organization to achieve its business goals and staff to conduct day-to-day business in a safe, efficient, orderly, and seamless manner. Workplace Services includes Safety, Security, Building Operations, Leasing, and Administration/Client Experience.
